title: Step 24

challengeFiles.name: index
styles

tests.text: You should add a new div element to body. Expected --fcc-expected-- div elements, but found --fcc-actual--.
You should give the new div element a class of sun.
You should place the new div element immediately after the .back-mountain element.

description: To finish the background, add a sun, by creating a new div element immediately after the .back-mountain element, and give it the class of sun.
